tool.name: clean raxml parsimony tree
tool.description: Remove duplicate tips from Raxml Tree

param.label: -t/--tips_to_keep: the input tips to score and retain (comma-separated list)
param.name: tips_to_keep

param.label: -s/--scoring_method: the scoring method either depth or numtips [default: depth]
param.name: scoring_method

tool.help: This script allows the user to remove specific duplicate tips from a Raxml tree.
